Description

Spatially Distributed Simulation of Soil Nitrogen Dynamics. Reference: Hugget, R.J. (1993): 'Modelling the Human Impact on Nature', Oxford University Press.

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input

Output

Options
